Successful! Yeah! It's working! Aha! Now I need to set up registration / log-ins / a design. You know, small things. =P
Just ate a delicious chicken parm sandwich. I got some actual stuff done on Fusend but now connecting to localhost is taking 10+ seconds...
Now; time to sleep.
Commenting up the code I have so far so I don't wake up tomorrow and look at this and spend half an hour figuring it out. Aha! Wisdom...
Figuring out the database relationships I want to use, this all seems to be hinging on serialized arrays. Total Aha! moment.
Coding and trying to sing along to Regina Spektor. Not doing too well at either.
Drinking Bawls & eating spicy chips. Mmm..
Back to work. =[
Roar, I need a break. Drums!
Trying to figure out how to set multiple simple pie feeds in the controller in CodeIgniter... Might have to be hacky about this.

commits.message: feat: add dlib to requirements.txt for facial landmark detection
feat: implement ASCII webcam eye detection; captures frames and displays eyes using ASCII characters on terminal
feat: add ascii_yolo_webcam.py for ASCII art rendering of faces; update dependencies and .gitignore for model files
feat: enhance glitch_braille_cam.py with frame blending and glitch effects; refine character set for improved visuals
feat: add glitch_braille_cam.py for generating Perlin noise and applying datamoshing effects; update requirements.txt
refactor: use native import for json instead of d3e
